x-enumDescriptions: Send group of photos or videos to album
Send a message and wait for response

chatId.description: Unique identifier for the target chat or username of the target channel (in the format @channelusername). To find your chat ID ask @get_id_bot.

messageId.description: Unique identifier of the message to edit

appendAttribution.description: Whether to include the phrase “This message was sent automatically with n8n” to the end of the message

disable_notification.description: Whether to send the message silently. Users will receive a notification with no sound.

disable_web_page_preview.description: Whether to disable link previews for links in this message

reply_to_message_id.description: If the message is a reply, ID of the original message

message_thread_id.description: The unique identifier of the forum topic

thumb.description: Thumbnail of the file sent; can be ignored if thumbnail generation for the file is supported server-side. The thumbnail should be in JPEG format and less than 200 kB in size. A thumbnail‘s width and height should not exceed 320.

userId.description: Unique identifier of the target user

queryId.description: Unique identifier for the answered query

results.description: A JSON-serialized array of results for the inline query

messageType.description: The type of the message to edit

binaryData.description: Whether the data to upload should be taken from binary field

binaryPropertyName.description: Name of the binary property that contains the data to upload

inlineMessageId.description: Unique identifier of the inline message to edit

file.description: Video file to send. Pass a file_id to send a file that exists on the Telegram servers (recommended), an HTTP URL for Telegram to get a file from the Internet.

action.description: Type of action to broadcast. Choose one, depending on what the user is about to receive. The status is set for 5 seconds or less (when a message arrives from your bot).

type.description: The type of the media to add

media.description: Media to send. Pass a file_id to send a file that exists on the Telegram servers (recommended) or pass an HTTP URL for Telegram to get a file from the Internet.

text.description: Text of the message to be sent

force_reply.description: Whether to show reply interface to the user, as if they manually selected the bot‘s message and tapped ’Reply

selective.description: Whether to force reply from specific users only

inlineKeyboard.description: Adds an inline keyboard that appears right next to the message it belongs to

callback_data.description: Data to be sent in a callback query to the bot when button is pressed, 1-64 bytes

pay.description: Whether to send a Pay button

switch_inline_query_current_chat.description: If set, pressing the button will insert the bot‘s username and the specified inline query in the current chat's input field.Can be empty, in which case only the bot’s username will be inserted

switch_inline_query.description: If set, pressing the button will prompt the user to select one of their chats, open that chat and insert the bot‘s username and the specified inline query in the input field. Can be empty, in which case just the bot’s username will be inserted.

url.description: HTTP or tg:// URL to be opened when button is pressed
An HTTPS URL of a Web App to be opened

replyKeyboard.description: Adds a custom keyboard with reply options

text.description: Text of the button. If none of the optional fields are used, it will be sent as a message when the button is pressed.

request_contact.description: Whether the user's phone number will be sent as a contact when the button is pressed.Available in private chats only

url.description: An HTTPS URL of a Web App to be opened

resize_keyboard.description: Whether to request clients to resize the keyboard vertically for optimal fit

one_time_keyboard.description: Whether to request clients to hide the keyboard as soon as it's been used

selective.description: Whether to show the keyboard to specific users only

remove_keyboard.description: Whether to request clients to remove the custom keyboard

selective.description: Whether to force reply from specific users only

x-enumDescriptions: User can approve/disapprove from within the message
User can submit a response via a form
User can submit a response via a custom form

fieldName.description: The name of the field, used in input attributes and referenced by the workflow

fieldLabel.description: Label that appears above the input field

fieldType.description: The type of field to add to the form

elementName.description: Optional field. It can be used to include the html in the output.

placeholder.description: Sample text to display inside the field

defaultValue.description: Default value(s) that will be pre-selected. Must match one or multiple of the option labels. Separate multiple pre-selected options with a comma.

fieldValue.description: Input value can be set here or will be passed as a query parameter via Field Name if no value is set

multiselect.description: Whether to allow the user to select multiple options from the dropdown list

html.description: HTML elements to display on the form page

multipleFiles.description: Whether to allow the user to select multiple files from the file input or just one

acceptFileTypes.description: Comma-separated list of allowed file extensions

requiredField.description: Whether to require the user to enter a value for this field before submitting the form

responseFormTitle.description: Title of the form that the user can access to provide their response

responseFormDescription.description: Description of the form that the user can access to provide their response

responseFormCustomCss.description: Override default styling of the response form with CSS

limitWaitTime.description: Whether to limit the time this node should wait for a user response before execution resumes

limitType.description: Sets the condition for the execution to resume. Can be a specified date or after some time.
x-enumDescriptions: Waits for a certain amount of time
Waits until the set date and time to continue

maxDateAndTime.description: Continue execution after the specified date and time

appendAttribution.description: Whether to include the phrase "This message was sent automatically with n8n" to the end of the message
